extendedInfo.description: Get the best of SportsDay, Sportsradio 1310 The Ticket and sports in D-FW with the must-have SportsDay TALK app. Access articles, chats and blogs from SportsDay and enjoy live broadcasts from SportsRadio 1310 The Ticket. Itâs a D-FWâs sports loverâs dream. ->Live, buffering Sportsradio 1310 The Ticket broadcasts (with a pause feature) â buffer up to 20 minutes of audio ->Archived broadcasts from The Ticket ->Articles and blogs from SportsDay ->Up-to-the-minute scores and schedules for your favorite teams including the Cowboys, Mavericks, Stars and Rangers as well as regional colleges (Texas A&M, University of Texas, Texas Tech, SMU, North Texas and more)->Live chats and Twitter feeds from Tim Cowlishaw, Rick Gosselin, Gordon Keith and more â all without having to leave the app Brought to you by The Dallas Morning News, Sports Day and Sportsradio 1310 The Ticket.

reviews.title: Freaking Awesome!!
reviews.comment: This is the app I\'ve been waiting for. I\'ve never had a problem listening to The Ticket on iHeart Radio or through the UnTicket podcast archived shows but now everything is in one place. DMN Sportsday news, Twitter accts for all DMN & Ticket people, excellent, at least so far, stream of Ticket programming with pause & rewind functions! Simply put, Freaking Awesome!!
reviews.author: Todd A Moore

reviews.title: Impatiently waiting for rewind..
reviews.comment: Will update rating if we ever get skip back, and RW/FF like our iOS cousins have.
reviews.author: Jeff McAhren

reviews.title: Can\'t load clips on Motorola droid
reviews.comment: Only reason I didn\'t give it a 1star rating is because I love the ticket.  It does stream well but on the clips it says please wait, this may take a while and I waited close to 15 minutes for a 5 minute clip.  I have loaded way more in a tenth of the time.
reviews.author: Will Boone

reviews.title: Needs some work
reviews.comment: As usual, iPhone version is more full featured and smoother. No rewind on galaxy s3. Can\'t wait till this app gets a widget and notification bar controls. VERY good for an initial app release though. I think the live polling feature has some potential (E-Brake voting!!!)

reviews.title: My life is complete now
reviews.comment: Thank you baby Santa for this beautiful app. Its just so appy brcherchr..so appy, and the glazed carrot. Seriously, this is really an all-in-one app, I\'ve used it for 68 seconds and can already tell you that it will be my most used app. I Love you.
reviews.author: Jason Gilbert

reviews.title: Keeps dropping
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t work well for the Galaxy 4s Active. It works for a while then drops. I\'ve cleared the cache, forced closed it and reinstalled it 3 times. I\'m going back to iHeart Radio. Will check back later for an improved version. Works great on my husband\'s iPhone.
reviews.author: Clair Kolman

reviews.title: Rewind?
reviews.comment: The guys on the air are saying it has rewind, but either they are just reading talking points, or it doesn\'t work on the Galaxy S3
reviews.author: David Paterson

reviews.title: How does a sports app ignore the world\'s most popular sport?
reviews.comment: No MLS or FC Dallas content renders this app useless.
reviews.author: Daniel Crooke

reviews.title: Meh...
reviews.comment: This is cool butTuneIn radio not only let\'s you pause and rewind live radio, it let\'s you record.
reviews.author: javier perez

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: For Android not much better than I heart radio app. Need rewind and fast forward. Also,  if you pause you may or may not get to go back AND it will loop on you so you only get about 1 segment in the paused portion. To get out of loop you have to go live and thus miss content. Awesome idea. Please work on Android version.
reviews.author: Carl Tucker

reviews.title: Love the ticket
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait to use this app 24 hours/day!
reviews.author: Jon Barber

reviews.title: Better than a haz-mat uniform
reviews.comment: Now this is why smartphones were invented! By the way, this is my opinion only. It is not shared, it is not shared, it is not shared, it is not shared, it is not shared, it is NOT SHARED!!!
reviews.author: Matthew Hollingsworth

reviews.title: Strong to quite strong app
reviews.comment: Perusing the app for the last hour, loving the one stop shop for colleges. Can\'t wait for the replay function for my droid. Battery life be damned! This is greatness.
reviews.author: michael figueroa

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This app is perfect for the sports guy AND the listeners of The Ticket.  The easy to use layout makes it simple to stream The Ticket, read news, get national sports stats, etc.  The Pause feature on the stream player is a great addition.  While I am not always a fan of Dallas Morning News, you hit it out of the park with this app.  Fantastic job, DMN.  My phone is a rooted HTC Sensation 4G (TMO) running ViperS 1.6.3.
reviews.author: Tom M

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: Much better alternative to iHeart and nice to have everything in one app such as scores, Twitter and older clips (which the Ticket guys are referring to as \'podcasts\'). I don\'t like the clunky/ugly design and lack of a landscape view, both of which are  big negatives for me. Also there\'s no rewind button on my HTC Evo. I\'ll be sticking with TuneIn Pro for now because of its rewind and recording features - I\'ll use this app to listen to old clips and maybe use it full time if they update it later down the road.
reviews.author: Roy Miller

reviews.title: A little disappointed
reviews.comment: Very clunky and difficult to navigate. Lacks lock screen controls, which every audio app should have. Does not take advantage of android style navigation. It feels like a straight port of an iPhone app.
reviews.author: Neil Simmons

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Makes my life easier by having sports at the touch of button!
reviews.author: Christopher Morris

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Lots of great sports information plus the Ticket !!
reviews.author: Rick Peoples

reviews.comment: Live it. Very intuitive from a navigational standpoint. Just installed it this morning, but have listened live and to some archived clips. No technical issues with it thus far.
reviews.author: Matthew Herrington

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Randomly loses connection even though phone is stationary. Will not automatically reconnect a day la k\'s widget
reviews.author: Jose Corral
